bin.name: binning
bin.description: Bin size for images (must be power of 2)

ace.name: ace
ace.description: Only use micrographs with this ACE confidence value and higher

selexonmin.name: selexonmin
selexonmin.description: Only use particles of this correlation value and higher

selexonmax.name: selexonmax
selexonmax.description: Only use particles of this correlation value and lower

defocpair.name: defocpair
defocpair.description: Get particle coords for the focal pair of the image that was picked in runid

medium.name: medium
medium.description: Medium of images, carbon or ice

outdir.name: output directory
outdir.description: Output directory for storing output files

single.name: single file
single.description: Create a single stack containing all the boxed particles

boxsize.name: box size
boxsize.description: Make stacks with this box size (unbinned)

inspected.name: inspected
inspected.description: Use only manually inspected images from database

mindefocus.name: mindefocus
mindefocus.description: Limit the defocus to values above what is specified

maxdefocus.name: maxdefocus
maxdefocus.description: Limit the defocus to values below what is specified

description.name: description
description.description: Description of the stack being created

prtlrunId.name: particle pick run id
prtlrunId.description: Runid DEF_id of previous particle picker run from database

partlimit.name: particle processing limit
partlimit.description: Stop boxing particles after total particles gets above limit

maskassess.name: mask assess run name
maskassess.description: If specified, masks accepted by the MaskAssessment run name is used to exclude area

phaseflip.name: phaseflip
phaseflip.description: Stack will be phase flipped using best ACE value in database

noinvert.name: noinvert
noinvert.description: If writing to a single stack, images will NOT be inverted

inspectfile.name: inspectfile
inspectfile.description: Text file containing results of manually checked images

spider.name: spider
spider.description: Single output stack will be in SPIDER format

tiltangle.name: tilt angle
tiltangle.description: Only box particles from images within 1 degree of this tilt angle
